Class TotalisticRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rule
      • TotalisticRule
  • public class TotalisticRule
extends Rule
    This Rule evolves a Cell based on how many Cells in a radius(which is 2 for this program) are ON. As 5 Cells are used to determine the state of any given Cell's state in the next Generation and the number of Cells that can be ON are 0-5, there are 6 subrules.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arjun Ganesan

    • Constructor Detail

      • TotalisticRule

        public TotalisticRule​(int ruleNum)
               throws InvalidRuleNumException
        Parameters:
        ruleNum - is the totalistic rule
        Throws:
        InvalidRuleNumException - with there being 6 subrules and 2 states each subrule can specify, there 64 total elementary rules. This exception throws any ruleNum that isn't between 0 and 255.

        Specified by:

        public EvolvedCell evolve​(Cell[] neighborhood)
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
